properties.name: spring.ai.chat.memory.repository.jdbc.initialize-schema
properties.description: Whether to initialize the schema on startup. Values: embedded, always, never. Default is embedded.

properties.name: spring.ai.chat.memory.repository.jdbc.platform
properties.description: Platform to use in initialization scripts if the @@platform@@ placeholder is used. Auto-detected by default.

properties.name: spring.ai.chat.memory.repository.jdbc.schema
properties.description: Locations of schema (DDL) scripts. Supports comma-separated list. Default is classpath:org/springframework/ai/chat/memory/repository/jdbc/schema-@@platform@@.sql
